attributes.action: make public the fees charged and advice given to the Government by Goldman Sachs in relation to Northern Rock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that Northern Rock has been nationalised the taxpayer will be footing the alleged £10 million bill for a few months of advice given by Goldman Sachs to the Government.  To date the Government and the financial regulators have refused to reveal this information.  The public have a right to know - we will be paying for it.
In December 2007 Goldman Sachs paid out an estimated £100 million pounds in bonuses, their profits for the first 9 months of the year were $8.4 billion.    The overtaxed, under pensioned citizens of Britain should not be expected to further fill their coffers without full disclosure of the facts.
